text: SNCF 040.DF was a class of one prototype diesel-hydraulic locomotive built for the SNCF built in 1952 by Renault. In 1962 it was renumbered from 040.DF.1 to BB 60041. Like the 060.DA, it was delivered in a livery of dark green with a yellow stripe. Category:SNCF locomotives Category:Bo-Bo locomotives
title: SNCF 040.DF
